Urheberrecht

Die durch die Seitenbetreiber erstellten Inhalte und Werke auf diesen Seiten unterliegen dem deutschen Urheberrecht. Die Vervielfltigung, Bearbeitung, Verbreitung und jede Art der Verwertung auerhalb der Grenzen des Urheberrechtes bedrfen der schriftlichen Zustimmung des jeweiligen Autors bzw. Erstellers. Downloads und Kopien dieser Seite sind nur fr den privaten, nicht kommerziellen Gebrauch gestattet. Soweit die Inhalte auf dieser Seite nicht vom Betreiber erstellt wurden, werden die Urheberrechte Dritter beachtet. Insbesondere werden Inhalte Dritter als solche gekennzeichnet. Sollten Sie trotzdem auf eine Urheberrechtsverletzung aufmerksam werden, bitten wir um einen entsprechenden Hinweis. Bei Bekanntwerden von Rechtsverletzungen werden wir derartige Inhalte umgehend entfernen.

Haftung fr Inhalte

Als Diensteanbieter sind wir gem 7 Abs.1 TMG fr eigene Inhalte auf diesen Seiten nach den allgemeinen Gesetzen verantwortlich. Nach 8 bis 10 TMG sind wir als Diensteanbieter jedoch nicht verpflichtet, bermittelte oder gespeicherte fremde Informationen zu berwachen oder nach Umstnden zu forschen, die auf eine rechtswidrige Ttigkeit hinweisen. Verpflichtungen zur Entfernung oder Sperrung der Nutzung von Informationen nach den allgemeinen Gesetzen bleiben hiervon unberhrt. Eine diesbezgliche Haftung ist jedoch erst ab dem Zeitpunkt der Kenntnis einer konkreten Rechtsverletzung mglich. Bei Bekanntwerden von entsprechenden Rechtsverletzungen werden wir diese Inhalte umgehend entfernen.

Haftung fr Links

Unser Angebot enthlt Links zu externen Webseiten Dritter, auf deren Inhalte wir keinen Einfluss haben. Deshalb knnen wir fr diese fremden Inhalte auch keine Gewhr bernehmen. Fr die Inhalte der verlinkten Seiten ist stets der jeweilige Anbieter oder Betreiber der Seiten verantwortlich. Die verlinkten Seiten wurden zum Zeitpunkt der Verlinkung auf mgliche Rechtsverste berprft. Rechtswidrige Inhalte waren zum Zeitpunkt der Verlinkung nicht erkennbar. Eine permanente inhaltliche Kontrolle der verlinkten Seiten ist jedoch ohne konkrete Anhaltspunkte einer Rechtsverletzung nicht zumutbar. Bei Bekanntwerden von Rechtsverletzungen werden wir derartige Links umgehend entfernen.

Datenschutz

Die Nutzung unserer Webseite ist in der Regel ohne Angabe personenbezogener Daten mglich. Soweit auf unseren Seiten personenbezogene Daten (beispielsweise Name, Anschrift oder eMail-Adressen) erhoben werden, erfolgt dies, soweit mglich, stets auf freiwilliger Basis. Diese Daten werden ohne Ihre ausdrckliche Zustimmung nicht an Dritte weitergegeben. Wir weisen darauf hin, dass die Datenbertragung im Internet (z.B. bei der Kommunikation per E-Mail) Sicherheitslcken aufweisen kann. Ein lckenloser Schutz der Daten vor dem Zugriff durch Dritte ist nicht mglich. item.title: About
item.dc:creator: sebastian
item.content:encoded:
Minimal Wordpress?

Yup, that's what this site is all about! mnmlWP ("minimal WordPress") is a free, lightweight, and easy to use WordPress theme. The mnmlWP theme is trying to make the development of WordPress based websites simple, efficient, and fun!
WordPress Approved
The mnmlWP theme has been approved by WordPress and is part of the official WordPress theme catalog. It complies with the recommended best practices of the WordPress Codex.
Free
The mnmlWP theme is available for free. Yup, you're welcome.
Leightweight
The mnmlWP theme generates very little overhead. Websites built with mnmlWP are fast and efficient.
Responsive
The mnmlWP theme design is 100% responsive. No matter what device, the layout will neatly adapt to the available screen sizes.
Customizable
The mnmlWP theme uses the internal WP customizer and allows you to configure your theme's look and feel according to your individual needs.
Translation-Ready
The mnmlWP theme is ready for internationalization and includes English and German (formal and informal) language files for both frontend and backend by default.

item.title: Features
item.dc:creator: sebastian
item.content:encoded:
Features Overview

[msg]This is an incomplete list of what the mnmlWP theme can do for you.[/msg]
  • General
    • Lightweight, simple, efficient
    • 100% responsive design
    • Fast loading time
    • FontAwesome icons
    • Optimized for cross-device usage
  • Customizer
    • Color scheme (20+ options)
    • Page layout
      • Main content width
      • Base font size
      • Boxed Layout
      • Breadcrumbs
      • Contact row
      • Search form
    • Logo image
    • Logo text + icon (FontAwesome)
    • Header background image
    • Contact form settings
      • E-Mail footer
      • Reply message
    • Hamburger icons
    • Customizer reset button
  • Data privacy
    • Zero external requests
    • Local font
  • Layout
    • 100% responsive design
    • 3-level main navigation
    • Simple layout shortcodes
    • 1/1, 1/2, 1/3, 2/3, 1/4, 3/4, 1/5, 2/5, 3/5, 4/5
    • Lists (ordered/unordered)
    • Image align left, right, center
    • Dynamic sidebar
  • Page Templates
    • Default (full width)
    • Featured image
    • Hero (posts & pages)
      • Hero section layout options
    • Post Archive
    • Blank
    • 404
    • Search results
    • Sidebar option
  • Post Formats
    • Standard
    • Audio
    • Gallery
    • Video
  • Widgets
    • Widget areas
      • Sidebar
      • Footer Left
      • Footer Middle
      • Footer Right
      • Footer Full Width
    • Recent Posts Widget
    • Colored Categories Widget
  • Plugins
    • Contact Form
      • Name
      • E-mail + confirmation
      • Message
      • Phone number (optional)
      • Address (optional)
      • Session-based security number
      • Honeypot fields
    • Shortcodes
      • Layout (columns/rows)
      • Blockquotes
      • Buttons
      • Message boxes
      • Flyout containers
      • Valuemeters
      • Contact form
      • YouTube
      • Vimeo
      • SoundCloud
      • Image Galleries
      • Highlighted text
      • Site-URL
      • Login-URL
      • Registration-URL
      • Username
      • Private content
      • Please read the documentation
  • Images
    • Additional image sizes
      • 1920x1080
      • 1600x900
      • 800x450
    • Lightbox image/galleries
  • Demo Content
    • Demo content import (uses the One Click Demo Import Plugin)
  • Developer
    • WordPress Codex compliant
    • Valid HTML
    • Translations
      • English
      • German
    • Pluggable shortcodes and functions
    • Lazy Loading
    • JS not required
  • Integrated update mechanism
    • Theme
    • Plugins
  • Recommended 3rd party plugins
    • Shariff Wrapper
    • Customizer Export/Import

item.title: Widgets
item.dc:creator: sebastian
item.content:encoded:
Widgets

[msg type="info"]You can see a preview of the widgets in this page's footer and sidebar.[/msg]

Colored Categories

The Colored Categories Widget enables you to attach individual colors to your post categories with a color picker and show them in your dynamic sidebar and footer columns. The widget options include the title, number of categories listed, hide empty categories, and colorize link text.

Recent Posts

The Recent Posts widget displays a list of posts together with a thumbnail of the post's featured image. The widget options include the title, number of posts listed, maximum length of post titles, and a checkbox to enable/disable the thumbnail image.

  • Sidebar (post/page)
  • Hero (post/page)
  • Hero + Sidebar (post/page)
  • Post Archive
  • Blank Post/Page Template
  • Blank Post/Page Template + Hero

item.title: Downloads
item.dc:creator: sebastian
item.content:encoded:
mnmlwp-0.4.1.zip mnmlwp-child-0.4.zip mnmlwp-contact-form-0.2.0.zip mnmlwp-shortcodes-0.2.0.zip

Instructions

  1. Install the mnmlWP theme on your website. You can add the theme directly from within your WordPress installation (Appearance > Themes > Add New > Search for "mnmlwp").
  2. Download the mnmlWP child theme and upload it to your website.
  3. Activate the child theme.
  4. Download and install the plugins recommended by the theme (optional).
  5. Download the mnmlWP shortcodes plugin and install it on your website (recommended).

mnmlWP Theme

This is the basic mnmlWP theme file. Download and add it to your WordPress installation. In case you don't know how themes work and how to add them, please read the WordPress Documentation first. [msg type="info no-icon"] mnmlwp-0.4.1.zip[/msg]

mnmlWP Child Theme

A child theme inherits the functionality and styling of another theme, called the parent theme. Child themes are the recommended way of modifying an existing theme. Find out more about child themes in the WordPress Documentation. [msg type="info no-icon"] mnmlwp-child-0.4.zip[/msg]

mnmlWP Contact Form

If you want to include a contact form into your website, you can download this plugin. The look and feel of the contact form has been optimized for the use with mnmlWP. The plugin does not require the mnmlWP theme though and can be used with any other WordPress theme. [msg type="info no-icon"] mnmlwp-contact-form-0.2.0.zip[/msg]

mnmlWP Shortcodes

This plugin includes all the shortcodes of the mnmlWP theme. According to WordPress best practices, all shortcode functionalities should reside outside of a theme. The theme itself will therefore still work even when the shortcodes plugin is not available or inactive. [msg type="info no-icon"] mnmlwp-shortcodes-0.2.0.zip[/msg]

Catal
Lorem Ipsum s un text de farciment usat per la indstria de la tipografia i la impremta. Lorem Ipsum ha estat el text estndard de la indstria des de l'any 1500, quan un impressor desconegut va fer servir una galerada de text i la va mesclar per crear un llibre de mostres tipogrfiques. No noms ha sobreviscut cinc segles, sin que ha fet el salt cap a la creaci de tipus de lletra electrnics, romanent essencialment sense canvis. Es va popularitzar l'any 1960 amb el llanament de fulls Letraset que contenien passatges de Lorem Ipsum, i ms recentment amb programari d'autoedici com Aldus Pagemaker que inclou versions de Lorem Ipsum.
Hrvatski
Lorem Ipsum je jednostavno probni tekst koji se koristi u tiskarskoj i slovoslagarskoj industriji. Lorem Ipsum postoji kao industrijski standard jo od 16-og stoljea, kada je nepoznati tiskar uzeo tiskarsku galiju slova i posloio ih da bi napravio knjigu s uzorkom tiska. Taj je tekst ne samo preivio pet stoljea, ve se i vinuo u svijet elektronskog slovoslagarstva, ostajui u sutini nepromijenjen. Postao je popularan tijekom 1960-ih s pojavom Letraset listova s odlomcima Lorem Ipsum-a, a u skorije vrijeme sa software-om za stolno izdavatvo kao to je Aldus PageMaker koji takoer sadri varijante Lorem Ipsum-a.
esky
Lorem Ipsum je demonstrativn vplov text pouvan v tiskaskm a knihaskm prmyslu. Lorem Ipsum je povaovno za standard v tto oblasti u od zatku 16. stolet, kdy dnes neznm tiska vzal kusy textu a na jejich zklad vytvoil speciln vzorovou knihu. Jeho odkaz nevydrel pouze pt stolet, on peil i nstup elektronick sazby v podstat beze zmny. Nejvce popularizovno bylo Lorem Ipsum v edestch letech 20. stolet, kdy byly vydvny speciln vzornky s jeho pasemi a pozdji pak dky potaovm DTP programm jako Aldus PageMaker.
Romna
Lorem Ipsum este pur i simplu o machet pentru text a industriei tipografice. Lorem Ipsum a fost macheta standard a industriei nc din secolul al XVI-lea, cnd un tipograf anonim a luat o planet de litere i le-a amestecat pentru a crea o carte demonstrativ pentru literele respective. Nu doar c a supravieuit timp de cinci secole, dar i a facut saltul n tipografia electronic practic neschimbat. A fost popularizat n anii '60 odat cu ieirea colilor Letraset care conineau pasaje Lorem Ipsum, iar mai recent, prin programele de publicare pentru calculator, ca Aldus PageMaker care includeau versiuni de Lorem Ipsum.

item.title: Front Page
item.dc:creator: sebastian
item.content:encoded:
Use this static Page to test the Theme's handling of the Front Page template file.
This is the Front Page content. Use this static Page to test the Front Page output of the Theme. The Theme should properly handle both Blog Posts Index as Front Page and static Page as Front Page.
If the site is set to display the Blog Posts Index as the Front Page, then this text should not be visible. If the site is set to display a static Page as the Front Page, then this text may or may not be visible. If the Theme does not include a front-page.php template file, then this text should appear on the Front Page when set to display a static Page. If the Theme does include a front-page.php template file, then this text may or may not appear.

item.title: Contact Form Demo
item.dc:creator: sebastian
item.content:encoded: [msg type="warning"]The contact form includes a session based security number. Your web server needs to support PHP sessions for the form to work. The form also includes honeypot fields to prevent bots from submitting the form. This is just a demo of the contact form, but you can find a working version on the contact page.[/msg] [contact message="Message can be inserted into the form as a parameter. Phone and address fields are optional." phone="1" address="1"] [pre style="margin-top:1em"][contact message="Message can be inserted into the form as a parameter. Phone and address fields are optional." phone="1" address="1"][/pre]

item.title: Questions & Anwers
item.dc:creator: sebastian
item.content:encoded:
[flyouts] [flyout title="Is the mnmlWP theme free?"]Absolutely! The mnmlWP theme is 100% free. You can use it for whatever project you can think of, commercial and non-commercial.[/flyout] [flyout title="Where can I find usage examples?"]You can browser the documentation by category. All examples listed in the docs include some demo code that illustrates how to use the themes templates and shortcodes. Using the site search will also be of help.[/flyout] [flyout title="Why are the shortcodes not working?"]Please make sure you download the mnmlWP shortcode plugin and add it to your WordPress installation. The plugin is a feature of this theme only and therefore not yet available in the WordPress plugin repository.[/flyout] [flyout title="How can I add a large header image to a post/page?"]
  1. Set your preferred image as the featured image of the post/page
  2. Select the "Hero" template for your post/page
  3. Save the post/page
  4. You will then have access to the settings of the "Hero" section at the bottom of the post/page
[/flyout] [flyout title="How can I import the demo content?"]You need to install the plugin One Click Demo Import. After plugin activation you will find the demo content option in the admin navigation (Appearance => Import Demo Date).[/flyout] [flyout title="Why should I download the child theme?"]Using the child theme instead of the mnmlWP main theme makes sure that your changes of the theme's files will not be overwritten once you update the main theme. Child themes are the recommended way of modifying an existing theme.[/flyout] [flyout title="How can I add the social icons widget?"]This site is currently using the Leightweight Social Icons plugin.[/flyout] [/flyouts]
More Questions?
If you experience any issues using the mnmlWP theme please do not hesitate to get in touch. I will take my time to answer your question and add the solution to this site. [btn href="/" type="small" text="Back to homepage"]

item.title: Demo Content
item.dc:creator: sebastian
item.content:encoded: [one_half][/one_half] [one_half_last]The theme includes demo content that you can import after installing the theme with just a few clicks. If you would like to install the demo content you can do so in the admin dashboard of your WP installation under Appearance > Import Demo Data. The demo data feature requires the plugin One Click Demo Import which is recommended when you install the mnmlWP theme.[/one_half_last] [clear_columns]

item.title: Pingdom Website Speed Test
item.dc:creator: sebastian
item.content:encoded: Yup, the mnmlWP theme is pretty fast. Testing the website speed for version 0.1.22 with Pingdom Tools provides aperformance grade of 100/100. The load time for the cached home page is 394 milliseconds which is less than half a second and faster than 98% of all tested sites. Please click here to display an image with the detailed results of the speed test.

item.title: Shortcodes Plugin 0.1.6 + Child Theme 0.3
item.dc:creator: sebastian
item.content:encoded: I just uploaded a new version of the mnmlWP shortcode plugin and the child theme. The updates fix some issues with the wpautop function (a WordPress core function that automatically inserts line breaks and paragraphs). Please update the shortcode plugin and the child theme to the latest version.

item.title: mnmlWP 0.2.6
item.dc:creator: sebastian
item.content:encoded: mnmlWP 0.2.6 is now online. Fixes include the theme header, minor CSS updates, and new demo content for the "Default" and "WordPress" layouts. Don't forget to download the child theme and shortcodes plugin if you want to use all of the theme's features.

item.title: mnmlWP 0.2.9
item.dc:creator: sebastian
item.content:encoded: Version 0.2.9 of mnmlWP has just been uploaded to the WordPress catalog. The most recent changes include custom post type support for post thumbnails (featured images) and some minor fixes in the source code that made the site crash in PHP5.3 server environments. Please drop me a mail if you still experience issues with mnmlWP and PHP5.3 or featured images in custom post types.

item.title: mnmlWP 0.2.10
item.dc:creator: sebastian
item.content:encoded:
The most recent update fixes some minor issues in the widgets "Colored Categories" and "Recent Posts". I have also added a donation button in the sidebar of this website in case you would like support me developing this theme with a cup of coffee once in a while. Last not least, I am looking forward to include the following new features in one of the upcoming theme updates:
  • Hero section templates
  • Layout templates (HTML/shortcodes)
  • Additional demo content
Everybody have a great weekend!

item.title: Simple Contact Form 0.1.8
item.dc:creator: sebastian
item.content:encoded:
The most recent update of the mnmlWP Simple Contact Form plugin introduces a new shortcode parameter. It allows you to send the form to as many recipients as you like. The "mailto" parameter takes a single or comma separated list of email addresses. The email addresses will be validated once you include them in the shortcode. If the mailto parameter is not specified the form will be submitted to the admin email address of your WordPress installation by default.

Example

[code][contact mailto="email1@yourdomain.com,email2@anotherdomain.com,email3@domainthree.com"][/code]

item.title: Datenschutzerklrung
item.dc:creator: sebastian
item.content:encoded:
Verantwortliche Stelle im Sinne der Datenschutzgesetze ist:

Sebastian Honert Lutzstrae 58 D-86157 Augsburg +49 (0) 179 9739851 info@mnmlwp.de

Erfassung allgemeiner Informationen

Wenn Sie auf unsere Webseite zugreifen, werden automatisch Informationen allgemeiner Natur erfasst. Diese Informationen (Server-Logfiles) beinhalten etwa die Art des Webbrowsers, das verwendete Betriebssystem, den Domainnamen Ihres Internet Service Providers und hnliches. Hierbei handelt es sich ausschlielich um Informationen, welche keine Rckschlsse auf Ihre Person zulassen. Diese Informationen sind technisch notwendig, um von Ihnen angeforderte Inhalte von Webseiten korrekt auszuliefern und fallen bei Nutzung des Internets zwingend an. Anonyme Informationen dieser Art werden von uns statistisch ausgewertet, um unseren Internetauftritt und die dahinterstehende Technik zu optimieren.

SSL-Verschlsselung

Um die Sicherheit Ihrer Daten bei der bertragung zu schtzen, verwenden wir dem aktuellen Stand der Technik entsprechende Verschlsselungsverfahren (z.B. SSL) ber HTTPS.

Kontaktformular

Treten Sie per E-Mail oder Kontaktformular mit uns in Kontakt, werden die von Ihnen gemachten Angaben zum Zwecke der Bearbeitung der Anfrage sowie fr mgliche Anschlussfragen gespeichert.

Lschung bzw. Sperrung der Daten

Wir halten uns an die Grundstze der Datenvermeidung und Datensparsamkeit. Wir speichern Ihre personenbezogenen Daten daher nur so lange, wie dies zur Erreichung der hier genannten Zwecke erforderlich ist oder wie es die vom Gesetzgeber vorgesehenen vielfltigen Speicherfristen vorsehen. Nach Fortfall des jeweiligen Zweckes bzw. Ablauf dieser Fristen werden die entsprechenden Daten routinemig und entsprechend den gesetzlichen Vorschriften gesperrt oder gelscht.

Eingebettete YouTube-Videos

Auf einigen unserer Webseiten betten wir Youtube-Videos ein. Betreiber der entsprechenden Plugins ist die YouTube, LLC, 901 Cherry Ave., San Bruno, CA 94066, USA. Wenn Sie eine Seite mit dem YouTube-Plugin besuchen, wird eine Verbindung zu Servern von Youtube hergestellt. Dabei wird Youtube mitgeteilt, welche Seiten Sie besuchen. Wenn Sie in Ihrem Youtube-Account eingeloggt sind, kann Youtube Ihr Surfverhalten Ihnen persnlich zuzuordnen. Dies verhindern Sie, indem Sie sich vorher aus Ihrem Youtube-Account ausloggen.

Wird ein Youtube-Video gestartet, setzt der Anbieter Cookies ein, die Hinweise ber das Nutzerverhalten sammeln.

Wer das Speichern von Cookies fr das Google-Ad-Programm deaktiviert hat, wird auch beim Anschauen von Youtube-Videos mit keinen solchen Cookies rechnen mssen. Youtube legt aber auch in anderen Cookies nicht-personenbezogene Nutzungsinformationen ab. Mchten Sie dies verhindern, so mssen Sie das Speichern von Cookies im Browser blockieren.

Weitere Informationen zum Datenschutz bei Youtube finden Sie in der Datenschutzerklrung des Anbieters unter: https://www.google.de/intl/de/policies/privacy/

Social Plugins

Wir bieten Ihnen auf unserer Webseite die Mglichkeit der Nutzung von sog. Social-Media-Buttons an. Zum Schutze Ihrer Daten setzen wir bei der Implementierung auf die Lsung Shariff. Hierdurch werden diese Buttons auf der Webseite lediglich als Grafik eingebunden, die eine Verlinkung auf die entsprechende Webseite des Button-Anbieters enthlt. Durch Anklicken der Grafik werden Sie somit zu den Diensten der jeweiligen Anbieter weitergeleitet. Erst dann werden Ihre Daten an die jeweiligen Anbieter gesendet. Sofern Sie die Grafik nicht anklicken, findet keinerlei Austausch zwischen Ihnen und den Anbietern der Social-Media-Buttons statt. Informationen ber die Erhebung und Verwendung Ihrer Daten in den sozialen Netzwerken finden Sie in den jeweiligen Nutzungsbedingungen der entsprechenden Anbieter. Mehr Informationen zur Shariff-Lsung finden Sie hier: http://www.heise.de/ct/artikel/Shariff-Social-Media-Buttons-mit-Datenschutz-2467514.html

Ihre Rechte auf Auskunft, Berichtigung, Sperre, Lschung und Widerspruch

Sie haben das Recht, unentgeltlich Auskunft ber Ihre bei uns gespeicherten personenbezogenen Daten zu erhalten. Ebenso haben Sie das Recht auf Berichtigung, Sperrung oder, abgesehen von der vorgeschriebenen Datenspeicherung zur Geschftsabwicklung, Lschung Ihrer personenbezogenen Daten.

nderung unserer Datenschutzbestimmungen

Wir behalten uns vor, diese Datenschutzerklrung gelegentlich anzupassen, damit sie stets den aktuellen rechtlichen Anforderungen entspricht oder um nderungen unserer Leistungen in der Datenschutzerklrung umzusetzen, z. B. bei der Einfhrung neuer Services. Fr Ihren erneuten Besuch gilt dann die neue Datenschutzerklrung.

Die Datenschutzerklrung wurde mit dem Datenschutzerklrungs-Generator der activeMind AG erstellt.

item.title: mnmlWP Featured on GeeThemes.com
item.dc:creator: sebastian
item.content:encoded:
The mnmlWP theme got reviewed on GeeThemes.com and is currenty ranked a fantastic third place out of 165 WordPress themes!

The theme received an overall score of 8.6 out of 10 which is even more awesome considering the fact that mnmlWP is still in an early stage of development. The score is calculated as the average between six different topics and received both 9 out of 10 for speed and SEO. However, mnmlWP scored way above average in all the other fields as well. Furthermore, the review points out as "Pros" the theme's documentation and demo content.

The Score in Detail

item.title: mnmlWP 0.2.11
item.dc:creator: sebastian
item.content:encoded: The 0.2.11 update adds three new settings for the hero post/page template. They enable you to define the height of the hero section in percent and/or pixels for desktop, tablet, and mobile screen resolutions. The update also fixes a few translation and CSS issues. Download mnmlWP on WordPress.org

item.title: Beneath the Remains
item.dc:creator: sebastian
item.content:encoded: You might have noticed that this blog has not been updated for quite a while. I'm very sorry about that. The primary reason for the lack of updates is that I managed to get my leg broke on August 1st during a Sepultura concert at Wacken Open Air Festival. Afterwards I spent a lot of time in different hospitals and had only little time and leisure to maintain or extend mnmlWP. Well, I guess that's what happens when 40 year old "festival virgins" like me try to feel young again. If you are curious about the whole story you can read more about it on Mel's Blog. Fortunately, I am feeling much better again. The leg has not fully recovered yet, but I can walk, drive a car, and ride my bike (thank God). Now I have to do physiotherapy and exercise quite a lot in order to improve the mobility of foot and leg and build up the musculature that has pretty much vanished over the past weeks and months. As things are slowly improving I took the opportunity to provide an update. Hooray! Besides improved readability through an increased font weight of several elements there are now two new options available in the customizer. The first option lets you enable/disable the sidebar for all new posts and pages by default. The second option allows you to show/hide the page title of new posts by default. That's all for today. I hope you're all healthy, happy and enjoying a great, golden autumn!

item.title: WordPress 5 Gutenberg Editor
item.dc:creator: sebastian
item.content:encoded:
mnmlWP is now ready for WordPress 5 and the Gutenberg editor.

There are still some bugs that I experienced, e.g. the blank page error when trying to manage reusable blocks (documented on GitHub). But otherwise this site is already running on WordPress 5 and it seems to be working just fine. After all the fuzz and lots of bad reviews for the new editor this came as a bit of a surprise to me.

Also, I didn't find the time yet to deal with the design of all the new block elements, e.g. pull quotes. Please bear with me on this one.

In case you experience any issues using mnmlWP, WordPress 5, and the Gutenberg editor please feel free to send me an email with a description of the problem.

Thank you! :-)

item.title: mnmlWP 0.3.6 Main Navigation and Customizer
item.dc:creator: sebastian
item.content:encoded:
Hello internet,
just wanted to post 1-2 sentences on the latest theme update. I added a fix for the sticky main navigation for the Safari browser family (there were some missing vendor prefixes in the main CSS file) and two customizer options that allow you to set the length of the post/page excerpts and show/hide the "read more" link.
Today we are having a lot of snow in Augsburg so it's a perfect time for some tea and the sofa.
Have a great Sunday!

item.title: mnmlWP 0.3.7 Menu Animation Styles
item.dc:creator: sebastian
item.content:encoded:
Hello internet!

After adding the latest fixes and some additional customizer options earlier today it occurred to me that it might also be nice to have different animation styles for the main navigation. And voil: you can now choose between a "slide in/out" and a "fade in/out" animation. The setting will affect both the animation of the desktop and mobile version of the menu.

item.dc:creator: sebastian
item.content:encoded:
[youtube id="0w_xEUoK79o" cover="/wp-content/uploads/2019/07/video-cover.jpg"]

If you want to add a cover image to prevent auto loading the player you can do so by specifying the "cover" parameter. If you leave the parameter blank the video will automatically be embeded on page load.

item.title: Contact Form
item.dc:creator: sebastian
item.content:encoded:
Contact Form Demo

[msg type="warning"]The contact form includes a session based security number. Your website needs to support PHP sessions for the form to work. The form also includes honeypot fields to prevent bots from submitting the form. This is just a demo of the contact form, but you can find a working version on the contact page.[/msg]

Please find the instructions on how to use the contact form on the plugin website.

[contact message="Message can be inserted into the form as a parameter. Phone and address fields are optional." phone="1" address="1"]

[contact message="Message can be inserted into the form as a parameter. Phone and address fields are optional." phone="1" address="1" mailto="email1@example.com,email2@example.com"]

item.title: Code / Unformatted Text
item.dc:creator: sebastian
item.content:encoded:
Code and unformatted text can be inserted by using the [[code]] shortcode. You can also use the WP Gutenberg editor block for code. The shortcode provides a very basic way to display preformatted text on your website and is probably not sufficient for complex demands. If you are looking for a more sophisticated solution you might want to have a look at the Enlighter Customizable Syntax Highlighter plugin.

<!DOCTYPE html>
<html lang="en">
  <head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <title>title</title>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="style.css">
    <script src="script.js"></script>
  </head>
  <body>
    <!-- page content -->
  </body>
</html>
